Package com.binance4j.core.event

Interface ScheduledEvent

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseScheduledEvent, IntervalEvent, TimeoutEvent
public interface ScheduledEvent
An scheduled event calling a TimerTask.

  • Method Details

    • getInitTime

      long getInitTime()
      Returns:
      The event instantiation time in ms.

    • getLastCall

      long getLastCall()
      Returns:
      The event last call time in ms.

    • cancel

      void cancel()
      Cancels the event.

    • getTicks

      int getTicks()
      Returns:
      The number of times the task was called.

    • isFinalTick

      boolean isFinalTick()
      Returns:
      Tells if the last tick is the final one.

    • isRunning

      boolean isRunning()
      Returns:
      Tells if the event is running.
